title: Drawing, "Saint Peter's Church, Alb", ca. 1870
medium:
Pen and black ink, watercolor, over graphite
Support: white wove paper
inscribed: in pen and black ink, at top: St. Peter's Church, Albany, N.Y./ 1/2 inch scale; at lower margin: Morris & Company/ 26 Queen Square/ Bloomsbury, London; at left margin, in Burne-Jones' hand*: Note. This/ figure/ Melchisedech/ should be in/ the centre/ space. ; in graphite, by another hand, at right: David; at lower margin: Annunciation Nativity Adoration;at right margin: David. *see notes

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Saint Peter's Church, Alb", ca. 1870. Pen and black ink, watercolor, over graphite
Support: white wove paper. 1946-71-4.
